magical_door.description: a tiny arched wooden door about knee-height, with ornate golden swirling patterns carved into dark oak, small round golden doorknob, warm golden light glowing from crack beneath

garden_shed.description: weathered wooden garden shed with peeling green paint, covered in climbing ivy and small white flowers, rustic planks, slightly crooked roof

wise_owl.description: large friendly owl with soft brown and cream feathers, big round amber eyes, small curved beak, tufted ears

baby_dragon.description: small cute baby dragon about cat-sized, soft mint-green scales, big round purple eyes with sparkles, tiny stubby wings, rounded snout, chubby legs

thornbush.description: tangled bush with dark twisted branches and small sharp thorns, some dried leaves

backyard_garden.description: sunny suburban backyard with green lawn, colorful flowers (red tulips, yellow daisies, purple lavender), wooden fence, blue sky with fluffy clouds

magical_forest.description: enchanted forest with tall ancient trees with gnarled trunks, soft dappled golden lighting through leaves, glowing blue and pink flowers on forest floor, small fireflies floating, moss-covered ground
